channel.title: Kemal Dostel on My Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Kemal Dostel on My Portfolio

item.title: Predicting House Prices with Machine Learning
item.description: A project to predict house prices with different features Investigated the dataset through descriptive analysis Exploratory analysis used to gain more insights on dataset Distrubution of the data is checked Different features are checked for correlation Missing data and outliers are investigated Transformed the data to normal distribution Generated new features Lastly regression model is trained with 80% variance. Most Correlated Features with Sale Price Predicted Prices vs Actual Prices Heat map helps us observe the strongly correlated features.

item.title: Covid-19 Data Exploration
item.description: A project based on the recent spike in Covid-19 infections Accessed the most recent publicly available Covid-19 data Cleaned and prepared the data for further analysis Initial exploratory analysis is conducted Some findings include: Countries with higest infection rate Continents with highest deaths Here we can see that the highest deaths occurred in the most populated continents. Whereas, countries which have lower GDP levels compared to first world countries such as USA, UK, Germany etc.

item.title: Public Bike Sharing
item.description: MSc thesis pre-research project Through research, identified a gap in the literature Determined a project objective with high relevance Collected publicly available data on bike sharing systems Cleaned and prepared the data for further analysis Initial exploratory analysis is conducted Data is prepared for cluster analysis K-means clustering is used to cluster stations on bike usage 3 clusters of stations near living, work and both areas achieved Average Hourly Bike Usage in 2019 Average Hourly Bike Usage in 2020 We can see that the overall hourly bike usage lowered in 2020 compared to 2019.
